original_text: And she again bare his brother Abel. And Abel was a keeper of sheep, but Cain was a tiller of the ground.
korean_text: 그가 또 가인의 아우 아벨을 낳았는데 아벨은 양 치는 자였고 가인은 농사하는 자였더라

sentences.original_text: And she again bare his brother Abel.
And Abel was a keeper of sheep
but Cain was a tiller of the ground.
